snippet.title: Showing the first version of my Indie Game DELTA VECTOR - Turn Based Racing!
snippet.description:
A VEEERY Special B.R.I.G.S.P.U.T! This time showing my own game!
Delta Vector is a Turn Based Racing Game, where you try and win races by finishing a lap in as few turns as possible! Based on the original pen and paper "Race Track" this game simulates the same vector based system in a completely digital format.
Check out the Steam Page and ADD TO WISH LIST if you want to help me out!!!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3437390/Delta_Vector__Turn_Based_Racing/

0:00 INTRO
4:15 GAMEPLAY
